vernac_cmds: Lemma local_facts_isptr: forall P Q (p: val), P p |-- !! Q -> (Q -> isptr p) -> P p = !! (isptr p) && P p.
Lemma local_facts_offset_zero: forall P, (forall p, P p |-- !! isptr p) -> (forall p, P p = P (offset_val 0 p)).
destruct p; simpl in *; apply pred_ext; normalize.
Lemma mapsto_local_facts: forall sh t v1 v2, mapsto sh t v1 v2 |-- !! (isptr v1 /\ tc_val' t v2).
apply prop_right; split; auto; apply Coq.Init.Logic.I.
Lemma mapsto__local_facts: forall sh t v1, mapsto_ sh t v1 |-- !! isptr v1.
Lemma mapsto_offset_zero: forall sh t v1 v2, mapsto sh t v1 v2 = mapsto sh t (offset_val 0 v1) v2.
change (mapsto sh t (offset_val 0 v1) v2) with ((fun v0 => mapsto sh t v0 v2) (offset_val 0 v1)).
Lemma mapsto__offset_zero: forall sh t v1, mapsto_ sh t v1 = mapsto_ sh t (offset_val 0 v1).
Lemma mapsto_isptr: forall sh t v1 v2, mapsto sh t v1 v2 = !! (isptr v1) && mapsto sh t v1 v2.
change (mapsto sh t v1 v2) with ((fun v1 => mapsto sh t v1 v2) v1).
Lemma mapsto__isptr: forall sh t v1, mapsto_ sh t v1 = !! (isptr v1) && mapsto_ sh t v1.

Definition size_compatible' (n: Z) (p: val) := match p with | Vundef => True | Vint _ => True | Vlong _ => True | Vfloat _ => True | Vsingle _ => True | Vptr _ i_ofs => Ptrofs.unsigned i_ofs + n < Ptrofs.modulus end.
Lemma memory_block_local_facts: forall sh n p, memory_block sh n p |-- !! (isptr p /\ size_compatible' n p).
Lemma memory_block_offset_zero: forall sh n v, memory_block sh n v = memory_block sh n (offset_val 0 v).
Lemma memory_block_isptr: forall sh n p, memory_block sh n p = !!(isptr p) && memory_block sh n p.
Lemma memory_block_zero: forall sh p, memory_block sh 0 p = !! isptr p && emp.
destruct p; try rewrite memory_block_zero_Vptr; simpl; change (!!False) with FF; repeat rewrite FF_andp; auto.
Lemma access_mode_by_value: forall t, type_is_by_value t = true -> exists ch, access_mode t = By_value ch.
assert (forall ch', exists ch, By_value ch' = By_value ch).
Lemma mapsto_by_value: forall sh t p v, mapsto sh t p v = !! (type_is_by_value t = true) && mapsto sh t p v.
destruct t; simpl; normalize; try (apply prop_right; auto).
Lemma memory_block_mapsto_: forall sh t p, type_is_by_value t = true -> type_is_volatile t = false -> size_compatible t p -> align_compatible t p -> memory_block sh (sizeof t) p = mapsto_ sh t p.
assert (isptr p \/ ~isptr p) by (destruct p; simpl; auto).
unfold sizeof in *; erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H1 |- * by eauto.

Lemma nonreadable_memory_block_mapsto: forall sh p t v, ~ readable_share sh -> type_is_by_value t = true -> type_is_volatile t = false -> size_compatible t p -> align_compatible t p -> tc_val' t v -> memory_block sh (sizeof t) p = mapsto sh t p v.
apply access_mode_by_value in H0; destruct H0 as [ch ?].
assert (isptr p \/ ~isptr p) by (destruct p; simpl; auto).
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H2 |- * by eauto.
Lemma memory_block_size_compatible: forall sh t p, memory_block sh (sizeof t) p = !! (size_compatible t p) && memory_block sh (sizeof t) p.
Hint Extern 1 (mapsto _ _ _ _ |-- mapsto _ _ _ _) => (simple apply mapsto_mapsto_int32; apply Coq.Init.Logic.I) : cancel.
Hint Extern 1 (mapsto _ _ _ _ |-- mapsto_ _ _ _) => (simple apply mapsto_mapsto__int32; apply Coq.Init.Logic.I) : cancel.
Lemma mapsto_force_ptr: forall sh t v v', mapsto sh t (force_ptr v) v' = mapsto sh t v v'.
Definition at_offset (P: val -> mpred) (z: Z): val -> mpred := fun v => P (offset_val z v).
Arguments at_offset P z v : simpl never.
Lemma at_offset_eq: forall P z v, at_offset P z v = P (offset_val z v).
Lemma lifted_at_offset_eq: forall (P: val -> mpred) z v, `(at_offset P z) v = `P (`(offset_val z) v).
Lemma at_offset_eq2: forall pos pos' P, forall p, at_offset P (pos + pos') p = at_offset P pos' (offset_val pos p).
Lemma at_offset_eq3: forall P z b ofs, at_offset P z (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) = P (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr (ofs + z))).
Lemma at_offset_derives: forall P Q p , (forall p, P p |-- Q p) -> forall pos, at_offset P pos p |-- at_offset Q pos p.
Definition spacer (sh: share) (be: Z) (ed: Z) : val -> mpred := if Z.eq_dec (ed - be) 0 then fun _ => emp else at_offset (memory_block sh (ed - be)) be.
Definition withspacer sh (be: Z) (ed: Z) P (p: val): mpred := if Z.eq_dec (ed - be) 0 then P p else P p * spacer sh be ed p.
Lemma withspacer_spacer: forall sh be ed P p, withspacer sh be ed P p = spacer sh be ed p * P p.
Lemma withspacer_ramif_Q: forall sh be ed P p, withspacer sh be ed P p |-- P p * allp ((fun Q => Q p) -* (fun Q => withspacer sh be ed Q p)).
apply RAMIF_Q.solve with (spacer sh be ed p).
Lemma spacer_offset_zero: forall sh be ed v, spacer sh be ed v = spacer sh be ed (offset_val 0 v).
repeat rewrite at_offset_eq; try rewrite offset_offset_val; try rewrite Int.add_zero_l; auto.
Lemma withspacer_add: forall sh pos be ed P p, withspacer sh (pos + be) (pos + ed) (fun p0 => P (offset_val pos p)) p = withspacer sh be ed P (offset_val pos p).
replace (pos + ed - (pos + be)) with (ed - be) by omega.
replace (offset_val (pos + be) p) with (offset_val be (offset_val pos p)).
Lemma offset_val_preserve_isptr: forall p pos, !! (isptr (offset_val pos p)) |-- !! (isptr p).
Lemma at_offset_preserve_local_facts: forall P pos, (forall p, P p |-- !!(isptr p)) -> (forall p, at_offset P pos p |-- !!(isptr p)).
Lemma withspacer_preserve_local_facts: forall sh be ed P, (forall p, P p |-- !! (isptr p)) -> (forall p, withspacer sh be ed P p |-- !! (isptr p)).
Lemma spacer_memory_block: forall sh be ed v, isptr v -> spacer sh be ed v = memory_block sh (ed - be) (offset_val be v).
destruct (Z.eq_dec (ed - be) 0); try solve [rewrite e; simpl offset_val; rewrite memory_block_zero_Vptr; auto].

Lemma spacer_sepcon_memory_block: forall sh ofs lo hi b i, 0 <= lo -> 0 <= ofs -> lo <= hi < Ptrofs.modulus -> Ptrofs.unsigned i + ofs + hi < Ptrofs.modulus -> spacer sh (ofs + lo) (ofs + hi) (Vptr b i) * memory_block sh lo (offset_val ofs (Vptr b i)) = memory_block sh hi (offset_val ofs (Vptr b i)).
rewrite sepcon_comm, Z.add_assoc, <- memory_block_split by omega.
Hint Rewrite spacer_memory_block using (simpl; auto): at_offset_db.

command: apply prop_right; split; auto; apply Coq.Init.Logic.I.
change (mapsto sh t (offset_val 0 v1) v2) with ((fun v0 => mapsto sh t v0 v2) (offset_val 0 v1)).
destruct p; try rewrite memory_block_zero_Vptr; simpl; change (!!False) with FF; repeat rewrite FF_andp; auto.
assert (forall ch', exists ch, By_value ch' = By_value ch).
destruct t; simpl; normalize; try (apply prop_right; auto).
assert (isptr p \/ ~isptr p) by (destruct p; simpl; auto).
unfold sizeof in *; erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H1 |- * by eauto.
apply access_mode_by_value in H0; destruct H0 as [ch ?].
assert (isptr p \/ ~isptr p) by (destruct p; simpl; auto).
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H2 |- * by eauto.
apply RAMIF_Q.solve with (spacer sh be ed p).
repeat rewrite at_offset_eq; try rewrite offset_offset_val; try rewrite Int.add_zero_l; auto.
replace (pos + ed - (pos + be)) with (ed - be) by omega.
replace (offset_val (pos + be) p) with (offset_val be (offset_val pos p)).
destruct (Z.eq_dec (ed - be) 0); try solve [rewrite e; simpl offset_val; rewrite memory_block_zero_Vptr; auto].
rewrite sepcon_comm, Z.add_assoc, <- memory_block_split by omega.
